Author: Alexander Ivanov
Title: Bounty Hunter - Platform for conducting ICOs.
Body: Good evening! Happy New Year!  Hooray, the Bounty campaign is over! We summed up the results of the contest and opened the possibility of outputting the tokens in your personal account, the section "Conclusion of BHT".  The results of the competitions can be found here: https://bountyhunter.club/Results_of_Bounty_Hunter_contests.txt  Unfortunately, our entire office is going on vacation, but we will monitor projects in passive mode. So if you have any questions, ask them in our official chat of telegrams, we are sure that there will be people there and help you deal with any issues (activists, all the hope for you!).  Sincerely, Bounty Hunter

Author: Alexander Ivanov
Title: Bounty Hunter - Platform for conducting ICOs.
Body: Good afternoon colleagues! Very cool news:  1. We are in talks with a major partner, and yet all very successful. When we can agree (I think later this month), we have and You will have the opportunity to make money regardless of how many projects we have on the site is. Unfortunately, I can't disclose more information, but it will be a very strong push for all our community and project! 2. We pre-selected for several new projects to host on our site. All the details of the report next week, but all according to plan, in 20 days we will hold the vote for the placement of new projects. Projects with which we communicate is very interesting, I hope You too will appreciate and accept our first "guests". Can add one more thing: For the placement of the first projects we decided to pay some portion of their tokens and some tokens projects will repurchase on the stock exchange (symbolically 50-200$) to support the project. Then the next projects will gradually conditions closer to what is written in the White Paper (the$ 10 000 equivalent to our tokens), but not immediately, gradually. 3. On the stock exchange while still no news, any idea about what to do if we fail partners, etc. so in any case something but take. 4. About the withdrawal of tokens - don't worry, network live forever will not be loaded. As soon cease to be so "stuffy" in the network broadcast, we will conduct manual operations, and those operations have been conducted (issued transaction number, but no such transaction) to be celebrated as it is the blockchain. Don't worry still got the tokens will not get to Your and all will be well.  With Respect, Administration Of The Bounty Hunter.

Author: Alexander Ivanov
Title: Bounty Hunter - Platform for conducting ICOs.
Body: Good day. We do our best to become better. And we do it all the time.  Today we bring to your attention the updates of our platform:  1. SUPPORT SERVICE. If you have a question to the project administrators posted on our site, you can ask this question now without leaving your personal cabinet. Each project has its own section "Customer Support".  2. TWO-FACTOR AUTHENTICATION. Your data is always safe! Your profile has a new tab to enable / disable this feature. Go to your "Profile", then in the "Settings", on the right the button for setting up "Notifications".  3. BROADCAST OF NOTIFICATIONS IN TELEGRAM (for projects). This option is for the project team. Now the project manager responsible for checking your reports will be notified of his receipt in the Telegram account. And of course about your questions in the support service.  These options are already working, and you can try them out right now!  Sincerely, Bounty Hunter.

Author: Alexander Ivanov
Title: Bounty Hunter - Platform for conducting ICOs.
Body: Good day!  Over the past few months, we have received a unique experience and feedback from projects that have been hosted on our platform. Moreover, we overcame the mark of 30,000 registrations (now> 31,200).  News â„–1 Based on the received feedback and experience, it was decided to reduce the 7-level referral system to 3-level. That is, the distribution of tokens will now be distributed according to the following scheme:  1 level - 50% Level 2 - 30% Level 3 - 20%  News â„–2 Now the level of payment in the referral program will be determined before the start of voting. If now one more token is distributed to the referral program for each earned token, then after the introduction of changes this coefficient will be coordinated with the project being placed. This is one of the huge requests of all the projects that were hosted by us. We should respect and listen to the projects being placed, in order to create comfortable conditions for all participants of the platform.   Let's look at an example of how the referral program will be calculated after the innovations: 1. For example, the coefficient that the project is willing to pay into the referral program is 50%; 2. The performer completed the task and earned 300 tokens; 3. Another 150 tokens were generated in the referral program (50% of the earnings of the performer); 4. The person who personally invited the artist receives 50% of this amount under the new system, that is 75 tokens (from 150); 5. The person who invited the person who invited him, receives according to the system of referral remuneration 30% of this amount, that is, 45 tokens (from 150); 6. And one more superior receives according to the system of referral remuneration 20% of this amount, that is, 30 tokens (from 150).   ATTENTION! All updates will take effect on April 6, at 18:00 UTC  P.S. We reserve the right to regulate the system of referral payments, and we take such decisions primarily based on the adequacy and feedback from all participants in the platform (bounty hunters, organizers, projects). Undoubtedly, this decision leads to stimulating bounty hunters to be the most effective on their own and to carry more value for the projects being placed, rather than to rely on referrals. But for those who want to become professional organizers, it becomes possible to earn the most from the first three levels, this encourages them to invite people personally and form powerful teams!  Sincerely, Bounty Hunter.

Author: Alexander Ivanov
Title: Bounty Hunter - Platform for conducting ICOs.
Body: Good day. Today 11.12.2017 in the project Bounty Hunter changes are made to the rules, as well as in the size of the rewards for completing tasks. So, in order. Additional rules were introduced:  8. We accept posts in social networks, posted only on your personal page. Given that you have at least 300 users on your friends list. Use of other (fake) pages is not allowed.  9. The restriction for posting a post in communities (groups) is: the number of participants (subscribers) in the community is not less than 3000 users.  Also, I suggest that you familiarize yourself with the changes in the list of rewards for completing tasks:  - Placement of information about the project in social networks (1-5 BHT)  - Placing information about the project on channels in instant messengers (1-5 BHT)  - Placing information about the project on websites and forums (5-30 BHT)  - Placing information about the project in the media (100-300 BHT)  - Placing the project in ICO sheets (for example: icobazaar.com, ico-list.com) (100-300 BHT)  - Organization and conduct of online presentations (100-200 BHT)  - Organization and conduct of offline presentations (100-500 BHT)  These rules come into force from the moment of publication of this announcement and are valid for those reports that will be sent today after 5 pm on MSK (GMT + 3).

Author: NickVasilich
Title: Bounty Hunter - Platform for conducting ICOs.
Body: How do you do every body!!! Since 11.12.17 founders of the BHClub will have been changed some rules and rewards for tasks execution. Additional conditions: 8. For social networking campaigns you would only post at your own pages/accounts. Fake and not owned accounts are prohibited to use. Amount of friends/followers not less than 300 people.  9. Allowed Posting in groups only with more 3000 followers.  New value of awards for task execution: - social networking campaigns (1-5 BHT); - messengers and channels campaign (1-5 BHT); - sites and forums campaign (5-30 BHT); - news broadcasting campaign (100-300 BHT); - placing projectâ€™s info in ICO sheets (icobazaar.com, ico-list.com), (100-300 BHT); - organizing and conducting of online  presentations (100-200BHT); - organizing and conducting of off-line presentations (100-500 BHT).  This conditions are becoming valid since this publication. For reports it takes effect after 17.00 Moscow (GMT+3).

Author: Alexander Ivanov
Title: Bounty Hunter - Platform for conducting ICOs.
Body: We invite you to Bounty Hunter Club - The Platform for conducting Bounty campaigns.  https://bountyhunter.club/view/img/logo_black.jpg  Site: http://bountyhunter.club White Paper: Bounty Hunter - WhitePaper (EN).pdf Telegram: @BountyHunterClub_EN Russian Bitcoin Talk topik: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2364846.msg24109903   Bounty Hunter - an Internet platform developed for simplify communication processes between executors  (Bounty hunters) and companies conducted ICO.  For Bounty hunters - we give opportunity get Bitcoin, Ethereum crypto currency and tokens applying by different companies without any investments. All is needed to execute simple tasks, placed on our platform. Per each accomplished task you can receive assigned bounty.  For organizers - for increasing of Bounty hunters amount we have mechanisms referral Partnership program. If you're good organizer and your surroundings have a lot of friends in social networks, desires, copywriters, and others are ready for work, you can give them chance to earn and receive for it reward. For every done task we charge to referral network the same amount of executor's fee. Such fee is distributed between high ranked referrals.  For companies, that conduct ICO - Our site is perfectly suitable for entrepreneurs, since after the project is placed they get access to a huge database of performers who are ready to start working and spread information about the company all over the Internet.   Our Advantages : Easy and handy registration which takes only few minutes of your time; Understandable interface; Big amount of Bounty hunters from all over the world; Big variety of tasks from complicated to simple ones. Every body can smth is suited to his skills, like social networking posting or meet ups conducting. Independent estimate of projects which guarantees financial security for Bounty hunters and also release them from choosing projects themselves. Opportunity to earn crypto currency (Bitcoin, Ethereum) and tokens from different companies; Obvious rating of Bounty hunter's achievements (rating according to separated projects and overall reputation), because of their status are clear to familiarize; Reports collection system simplifies for customers to organize Bounty hunters working process, by making some clicks; Referral partnership program allows to earn not only for executors but for organizers by inviting new Bounty hunters; Support unit is ready to provide needed help in case of different difficulties.  Road Map https://bountyhunter.club/view/img/roadmap.jpg   BHT tokens distribution chart Overall issue: 30 000 000 BHT For Bounty campaign: 1 500 000 BHT (5%) For Team: 3 000 000 BHT (10%) This chapter shows MAX amount of tokens which could be distributed between Bounty campaign, Team and for Sale.All undistributedor not sale tokens will be "burned" (Tokens distribution and burning algorithm).  6 November â€“ 3 December â†’ Pre-ICO 6 â€” 12 November: 1$ = 4 BHT 12 â€” 19 November: 1$ = 3,5 BHT 19â€” 26 November: 1$ = 3 BHT 26 November â€” 4 December : 1$ = 2,5 BHT MAX token amount for Pre-ICO is 5 500 000 BHT  4 â€“ 28 December â†’ ICO 4 â€” 5 December: 1$ = 2 BHT 5 â€” 10 December: 1$ = 1,8 BHT 10 â€” 14 December: 1$ = 1,5 BHT 14 â€” 17 December: 1$ = 1,2 BHT 17â€” 28 December: 1$ = 1 BHT   Bounty-campaign Bounty-campaign for our Platform is conducted only by means Bounty Hunter Club. To participate follow registration procedure: https://bountyhunter.club  On the 30th of October we starts Bounty campaign for promoting Bounty Hunter Platform. We'll place on the Platform first task to execute. For it's execution you could receive BHT tokens. Bounty campaign consist of 3 parts.  1. Awards for registration till 11/06/2017 2. Awards for task execution 3. Competitions "The best organizer" and "The best executor"  Details read in White Paper.  FAQ on Bounty Hunter Club  1) General issues (ICO).  How to work with Bounty Hunter Club? Answer: To get started with Bounty Hunter Club, you just need to register. In your personal account you can find Bounty programs with tasks inside, (Dashboard -> Projects) - this section displays the bounty of the campaign). Go to any project by clicking on its name or picture and you will see a more detailed description. For a more detailed introduction to the project and its purpose, we recommend that you read White Paper.  What's the point of me registering here if I can work directly with ICO? Answer: The main advantage of working with the Bounty Hunter project is the absence of a threshold for entry, when the absolute majority of ICOs put forward exaggerated demands on Bounty program participants. Also, we draw your attention to the fact that you are guaranteed to receive a reward for performing tasks. the token fund released on the Bounty program is frozen and can not be redistributed to other purposes.  Do I have to pay for something? Answer: At the moment the site is absolutely free for registration, upon reaching 100,000 users we plan to introduce a paid subscription. Users who have registered and receive at least one star of the performer will receive a free annual subscription.  How are the rewards awarded? Answer: Rewards are accrued after the report is submitted and verified by the moderator.  When can I get my tokens? Answer: All accumulated tokens are paid at the end of the Bounty program or after 92 days.  How can I get my tokens now? Answer: You can withdraw the earned tokens through a currency exchange. Exit to the stock exchange is planned after the completion of the ICO stage.  Will I be able to earn the BHT tokens after the completion of the ICO? Answer: You can earn BHT Tokens only during the Bounty until December 28, 2017. After this period, the BHT tokens will be available only on the exchange.  On which exchanges will BHT be listed? Answer: The list of exchanges will be announced after the completion of the ICO phase.  When will other ICOs appear? Answer: After December 28, the site will be available for other ICOs  How can I be sure that the posted projects will not be Scam? Answer: All projects that have expressed a desire to be placed on the site undergo a strict moderation, and at the last stage they are eliminated by the method of voting by the Bounty Hunter.  How to purchase BTH? Answer: BHT you can buy on the purchase page (https://bountyhunter.club/gettokens), as well as performing the tasks presented on the project page or in White Paper.  What will the value of BHT depend on? Answer: The cost of BHT is a constantly growing asset, which increases from each new ICO project posted on the site.  What are the guarantees that I will receive a reward after completing the tasks? Answer: The allocated funds for the Bounty program are frozen and controlled by the Bounty Hunter site, so we can safely say that your earned tokens will be safe and sound.  Who will check the reports in the new ICO? Answer: Each ICO will have its own moderator, we will perform an exclusively supervisory function in order to avoid fraud on the part of the organizers of the ICO, as well as to carry out technical support.  2) Registration.  I invited a person, and the registration was credited to another? Answer: Perhaps earlier he had already crossed someone else's referral link, only the first transition was taken into account. Contact technical support to change the curator.  How to change your curator? Answer: Contact the technical support on the site - http://bountyhunter.club/?act=support.  How to find out who invited me? Answer: You can see this information in your personal account.  I forgot my password. Answer: To restore the registration data, click on recover password or contact technical support.  Prohibited schemes for attracting referrals Answer: Using the services of the category "Clicks", spam.  3) My account.  Why is there only one project in the projects section? Answer: At the moment the company is at the ICO stage. At the end of the stage, third-party ICOs will be placed on the site.  Where are the tasks? Answer: The tasks are in the "Projects" section by clicking on the icon or heading you will get to the project description, where there will be a list of tasks and rewards for execution.  How do I send a report? Answer: To send the report, go to the ongoing project, go to the reports section, click the add report button, select the category and insert the links to the posted materials. (insert an image with an example of a quality report)  I have an error / problem, what should I do? Answer: If you have any questions, you can always contact the support team both on the site - http://bountyhunter.club/?act=support, and in the telegrams of the channel - https://t.me/BountyHunterClub.  4) Reports / tasks.  How many comments / themes can I create in one forum, in one topic? Answer: One forum can use an infinite number of topics for publications.  I created the video, but I did not get paid for it or charged a little, why? Answer: Charging depends on the number of views and ratings of your video, if there are no people on your channel, then no one will look at it, so this material does not carry any usefulness  What kind of posts / topics are included in the test? Answer: Themes of advertising, news or narrative character related to the project.  Is it forbidden to post information on forum sites? Answer: It is allowed, but those forums are recommended for posting, which in one way or another can be connected with the project.  I have my own channel (group, community), will the messages on it be counted? Answer: Activity on their channels, groups and communities is counted for the total period of activity at the time of the Bounty program.  Why did my report decline? Answer: The reason for the refusal is the following: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1PInF5Eeua1OH0HTOZ2eOMAtN68riOfh3YqqADF70H5s/edit?usp=sharing  How fast are the reports verified? Answer: The reports are checked on working days from Monday to Friday, from 11:00 Moscow time to 19:00 Moscow time with a break for lunch.  How is the rating of the artist calculated? Answer: The rating of the executor, charged for the fulfillment of tasks by the contractor, depends on: the number of tasks performed and submitted in the report; on the quality of their implementation;  How is the organizer's rating credited? Answer: The rating of the organizer, charged for the performance of referrals, depends on: the number of tasks completed and submitted in the report; on the quality of their implementation;
